Jackbox Party Pack.name: You Don't Know Jack 2015
Jackbox Party Pack.description: The comedy trivia sensation returns with hundreds of new questions that you can tackle on a night in by yourself or when you’re joined by friends.

Jackbox Party Pack.name: Drawful
Jackbox Party Pack.description: The first installment of the wildly popular drawing game allows you to draw bizarre doodles on your phone or tablet.

Jackbox Party Pack.name: Word Spud
Jackbox Party Pack.description: Test your vocabulary chops in the racy-as-you-want-it-to-be fill-in-the-blank word game.

Jackbox Party Pack.name: Lie Swatter
Jackbox Party Pack.description: Need a game for a big group? Grab yourself or a crowd and play true-or-false with a timer. Don’t get swatted in this wacky fact-filled game! Grab the original Jackbox Party Pack to experience the storied Jackbox Games franchises in their first form.

Jackbox Party Pack.name: Fibbage XL
Jackbox Party Pack.description: The hilarious bluffing game now has 50% more questions added to the original hit game, Fibbage. Convince your friends that you know the answers to odd trivia questions OR aim to win the Thumbs Cup with the funniest answer.

Jackbox Party Pack 2.name: Fibbage 2
Jackbox Party Pack 2.description: The runaway hit bluffing game with over 500 brand-new questions, more than 2x the original! Plus new features, like the deFIBrillator!

Jackbox Party Pack 2.name: Earwax
Jackbox Party Pack 2.description: The hear-larious sound-effects game that will leave you up to your ears in laughter! Cow moo? Huge explosion? Or tiny fart? Which to choose?

Jackbox Party Pack 2.name: Bidiots
Jackbox Party Pack 2.description: The absurd art auction game where you draw right there on your phone or tablet. Outbid your opponents for weird art pieces – drawn by players themselves – and win this strangely competitive auction game! Don’t be a bidiot!

Jackbox Party Pack 2.name: Quiplash XL
Jackbox Party Pack 2.description: The say-anything, gut-busting Quiplash XL (3-8 players), which includes everything in Quiplash, Quip Pack 1, AND over 100 brand-new prompts!

Jackbox Party Pack 2.name: Bomb Corp.
Jackbox Party Pack 2.description: The bomb-defusing nailbiter of a party game! As interns at Bomb Corp., you must defuse random bombs in the office in order to keep your jobs. You’ll probably die, but it’ll be good work experience!

Jackbox Party Pack 3.name: Quiplash 2
Jackbox Party Pack 3.description: The say-anything sequel. Play all new questions or make your own!

Jackbox Party Pack 3.name: Trivia Murder Party
Jackbox Party Pack 3.description: A deadly quiz show where you match wits with a trivia-obsessed killer.

Jackbox Party Pack 3.name: Tee K.O.
Jackbox Party Pack 3.description: The t-shirt slugfest where you battle your custom t-shirts to the death!

Jackbox Party Pack 3.name: Fakin' It
Jackbox Party Pack 3.description: One of your friends has something to hide in this sneaky game for tricksters.

Jackbox Party Pack 4.name: Fibbage 3
Jackbox Party Pack 4.description: The blanking fun sequel with all-new question types and the game mode Fibbage: Enough About You where you guess the weird facts about your friends.

Jackbox Party Pack 4.name: Survive the Internet
Jackbox Party Pack 4.description: The web-based frame game where you twist your friends’ “online” comments in hilarious ways.

Jackbox Party Pack 4.name: Monster Seeking Monster
Jackbox Party Pack 4.description: The spooky date-a-thon where you message and date fellow monsters with special powers.

Jackbox Party Pack 4.name: Bracketeering
Jackbox Party Pack 4.description: The deranged debate match where you place smart bets on stupid arguments.

Jackbox Party Pack 4.name: Civic Doodle
Jackbox Party Pack 4.description: The one-up art game where you compete to improve the town murals.

Jackbox Party Pack 5.name: You Don't Know Jack: Full Stream
Jackbox Party Pack 5.description: The pop-culture trivia mash-up YOU DON’T KNOW JACK: Full Stream. The classic returns, full of wild new surprises.

Jackbox Party Pack 5.name: Split The Room
Jackbox Party Pack 5.description: The what-if game Split the Room. Create strange and divisive hypothetical situations.

Jackbox Party Pack 5.name: Mad Verse City
Jackbox Party Pack 5.description: The lyric-writing game Mad Verse City. Channel your inner MC as a rap battling robot.

mx.name: Mad Verse City: Ciudad del Rap

es.name: Mad Verse City: Ciudad del Rap

Jackbox Party Pack 5.name: Patently Stupid
Jackbox Party Pack 5.description: The competitive drawing game Patently Stupid. Create odd inventions to solve bizarre problems.

Jackbox Party Pack 5.name: Zeeple Dome
Jackbox Party Pack 5.description: The deadliest game show in the Crab Nebula, Zeeple Dome! Fling yourself at bloodthirsty aliens to win millions of Zubabucks!

Jackbox Party Pack 6.name: Trivia Murder Party 2
Jackbox Party Pack 6.description: The popular trivia deathmatch Trivia Murder Party 2. Try to survive the bizarre new minigames.

Jackbox Party Pack 6.name: Role Models
Jackbox Party Pack 6.description: The offbeat personality test Role Models. Find out who you really are. (Or at least what your friends think of you.)

Jackbox Party Pack 6.name: Joke Boat
Jackbox Party Pack 6.description: The comedy contest Joke Boat. Craft one-liners for a cruise ship talent show.

Jackbox Party Pack 6.name: Dictionarium
Jackbox Party Pack 6.description: The weird word circus Dictionarium. May the funniest definition win.

Jackbox Party Pack 6.name: Push The Button
Jackbox Party Pack 6.description: The hidden identity game Push The Button. Can you discover the aliens in time?

Jackbox Party Pack 7.name: Quiplash 3
Jackbox Party Pack 7.description: The say-anything threequel Quiplash 3. It’s a head-to-head battle of the wits as you give hilarious responses to quirky prompts while everyone else votes for their favorite!

Jackbox Party Pack 7.name: The Devils and the Details
Jackbox Party Pack 7.description: The collaborative chaos game The Devils and the Details. You’re a family of devils working together to survive in suburbia. Can you handle the daily torture of human life?

Jackbox Party Pack 7.name: Champ’d Up
Jackbox Party Pack 7.description: The drawing fighting game Champ’d Up. Create absurd characters that will battle over unusual titles. Can you take down the heavy favorite?

Jackbox Party Pack 7.name: Talking Points
Jackbox Party Pack 7.description: The on-the-spot public-speaking game Talking Points. Give a speech responding to picture slides you’ve never seen before or be the Assistant and approve pictures as fast as you can. Just keep talking whether it makes sense or not.

Jackbox Party Pack 7.name: Blather ‘Round
Jackbox Party Pack 7.description: The pop culture guessing game Blather Round. Describe your secret prompt with a very limited vocabulary and hope that someone can figure it out in time. It’s a “GOOD” “FUN TIME” “EXPERIENCE.”

Jackbox Party Pack 8.name: Drawful Animate
Jackbox Party Pack 8.description: It’s alive! The guessing game with terrible drawings and hilariously wrong answers makes a dynamic return. In this revamped title, players create looping, two-frame animations based on weird and random titles.

Jackbox Party Pack 8.name: Job Job
Jackbox Party Pack 8.description: Use other people’s words to create unique and funny answers to classic job interview questions. Go head to head to see who scores the job!

Jackbox Party Pack 8.name: The Poll Mine
Jackbox Party Pack 8.description: A survey game that’s all about YOU! Split into teams and see who can escape from the witch’s lair! Players individually rank their choices to a difficult question, then must guess how the group answered as a whole. How well do you know your friends?!

Jackbox Party Pack 8.name: Weapons Drawn
Jackbox Party Pack 8.description: A social deduction game where everyone is both a murderer and a detective. Players doodle all the clues, hiding a letter from their name in the weapon drawings. Can you solve murders while trying to get away with your own?

Jackbox Party Pack 8.name: The Wheel of Enormous Proportions
Jackbox Party Pack 8.description: Trivia has never been so large! A fantastic, mystical wheel challenges you with a variety of trivia prompts. Winners are awarded slices of the Wheel’s face with a chance to win big with each nail-biting spin. In the end, one player will have their most burning question answered by the great Wheel.

Quiplash.name: Quiplash
Quiplash.description: Quiplash is the gut-busting battle of wits and wittiness! Just use your phone or tablet (no controllers needed) to answer simple prompts.

Quiplash 2 InterLASHional.name: Quiplash 2 InterLASHional
Quiplash 2 InterLASHional.description: The “say anything” party game is going international! All the hilarious content from Quiplash 2, now in French, Italian, German, and Spanish! With 100 NEW prompts in each language!

Drawful 2.name: Drawful 2
Drawful 2.description: Drawful is back to save your next party with Drawful 2, which challenges players to draw ridiculous prompts on their smartphones and tablets.

Fibbage XL.name: Fibbage XL
Fibbage XL.description: The hilarious bluffing game now has 50% more questions added to the original hit game, Fibbage. Convince your friends that you know the answers to odd trivia questions OR aim to win the Thumbs Cup with the funniest answer.
